scripts.build: mkdir -p _build && bsc -pp refmt -impl src/client.re && mv src/client.cm* _build/ && mv src/client.js _build/client.js
scripts.example: mkdir -p _build/top && refmt -parse re -print ml src/example.re > _build/top/example.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/client.re > _build/top/client.ml && refmt -parse re -print ml src/web.re > _build/top/web.ml && cd _build/top && bsc -bs-package-name ReSocketIO -c -bs-files *.ml && ../../node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js example.js --output-file app.js
